meanings.sent1: The palmisters at the fair predicted my future.
meanings.sent2: She consulted a palmisters to read her palm lines.
meanings.sent3: The palmisters joked that my fate was in my hands, literally!
meanings.sent4: The palmisters' touch seemed to reveal hidden truths.
meanings.sent5: I was amazed by the accuracy of the palmisters' readings.

meanings.definition: relating to or characteristic of palmistry
meanings.sent1: Her palmisters skills helped her interpret the lines on my hand.
meanings.sent2: The palmisters art of reading palms fascinated me.
meanings.sent3: It was a palmisters party, where everyone's future was foretold.
meanings.sent4: The palmisters moon seemed to guide their predictions.
meanings.sent5: The palmisters symbols on the chart were intriguing.
